title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
created_time: November 18, 2022, 07:31:54 PMLast edit: December 01, 2022, 04:08:27 AM by MoparMiningLLC
content: Hello!Balletcrypto has a customer who ordered custom sleeves for an upcoming event and the organizer has agreed to let me have 30 of them for sale here on the forums for those collectors that also like to collect the various wallets and sleeves released by ballet.If you would like to see their site, you can visit www.EconomicPreppers.comcost will be $35 per wallet and can be shipped direct or sent to minerjones for consolidation/reshipping.please post your name and qty desired - keep in mind, only 30 are available. pymt address: bc1qn37ly2yjla0thlnfsverzezrvxtxdsyvecp4esif you would prefer another means of payment - please reach out to me via DM first.Thanks!

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC

comments.author: Steeley
comments.body: Thanks Mopar. Always appreciate you making these rare versions of Ballet available to the forum members.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: Steeley on November 23, 2022, 04:25:25 AMThanks Mopar. Always appreciate you making these rare versions of Ballet available to the forum members. I try - it bites me in the ass sometimes as I do not always hit the minimum lol so have to buy quite a few for myself in those cases lol but thats only a few times.

comments.author: stackinsats777
comments.body: I'll take one pleaseI'll send over payment for this and the holiday cards momentarily.Thanks Mopar!

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: just got notice these have shipped to me and should be here next week so for those that have not paid, please send pymt and I will be in touch when they arrive.Also, there are still 10 available.

comments.body: will have these in hand today so will be reaching out to those who purchased one for shipping preferences.also - still 10 available.

comments.body: I'm looking for one of those Ballet wallets. Shoot me a message if you wanna part one...greets & thanks in advance
